properties.entry: SELECT COUPON_NAME ,CEIL(COUPON_ENDDATE - SYSDATE) COUPON_EXPIRE ,COUPON_RATIO FROM TB_COUPON C JOIN TB_MEMBER_COUPON MC USING (COUPON_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER M USING (MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND COUPON_AVAIL = 'Y' AND MEMBER_COUPON_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT REWARD_DATE, REWARD_REASON, REWARD_SCORE, (SUM(REWARD_SCORE) OVER(PARTITION BY MEM_NO ORDER BY REWARD_NO ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)) "REMAIN_REWARD_SCORE" FROM TB_REWARD WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND REWARD_SCORE != 0 ORDER BY REWARD_DATE DESC) A)
SELECT DM_NO, RECEIVE_MEM, SEND_MEM, DM_CONTENT, SEND_DATE, DM_STATUS, DM_REPLY, JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NICKNAME) WHERE MEM_NICKNAME = ? ORDER BY DM_NO DESC

SELECT RECIPE_NO, RECIPE_TITLE, RECIPE_DATE, RECIPE_MODIFIED DATE, RECIPE_STATUS, RECIPE_COUNT, RECIPE_WRITER_NO, RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO,
JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE RECIPE_WRITER_NO = MEM_NO
SELECT DM_NO, RECEIVE_MEM, SEND_MEM, DM_CONTENT, SEND_DATE, DM_STATUS, DM_REPLY, JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NICKNAME) WHERE MEM_NICKNAME = ? ORDER BY DM_NO DESC
